title: Update static maxValue variable - describe result

content.question: Which of the following best describes the number of times that the code segment updates  maxValue  after it is initialized to  0?

choices.label: It is never updated because it is declared  static.
It is updated 2 times, first when  a  is created and again when  c  is created.
It is updated 3 times because the code segment creates exactly 3  Element  objects.
It is updated 4 times because the code segment creates exactly 4  Element  objects.

content.answer: It is updated 2 times, first when  a  is created and again when  c  is created.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
